website_summaries.verdict: This anti-allergen shampoo does a good job of removing pet dander for people who have allergy problems.
pros: Works in warm or cold water cleaners
Product has a fresh clean scent
Does a good job with pet hair
Helps humans who are having problems with pet allergens in carpets
cons: The smell of this product can be a little strong if you use too much of it

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: Allergy season is in full swing around here, so like any good parent I decided to help my sneezing/sniffling/itching allergy-ridden children by spending 6 hours (yesterday) vacuuming and shampooing over 1200 square feet of carpeting. It seems to have helped a little, and the cloyingly overly-fragrant scent has subsided into the usual ADMS allergy spray scent that we have come to know and love. The girls spent an hour on the carpet this afternoon, and there were no signs of itching and other symptoms seemed to have abated somewhat. The carpet is a little "crunchier" than usual (I normally use the Bissell Pet Stain & Odor Remover), but I am sure it will soften up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J. Toops

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job cleaning, as good as Bissell or Hoover products easily. Ingredients are strong, so careful of full concentrate leaking from your unit. No worries, just make sure you go over the spot with the shampooer - don't let it set in and you're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Fritzwater

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Life (wallet)
customer_reviews.text: Just diagnosed as having allergies and was told to get rid of the carpet. Well, I have only been in my home 6 years and who wants to buy new flooring. I have berber and I love it. So, I was given a brochure of different products to buy to help get my home allergen free and this company's name was listed with different products and I decided to see what all they offered. To my surprise, they made this carpet shampoo. Hallelujah!!!! This would solve my problem and I ordered it. Love the product and will continue to order it until we decide to spend the money on a new floor in the home.
customer_reviews.author: CAMYSNO1MOM

customer_reviews.title: Strong anti-allergen
customer_reviews.text: Though this stuff is real good in denaturing dander -it leaves a strong smell behind for a day or two that you might be sensitive to. I have an air purifier so it's a non-issue for me. Otherwise, fabulous product!!
customer_reviews.author: Varghese Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for years and has reduced indoor allergies.
customer_reviews.author: VTT

customer_reviews.title: sons asthma improved
customer_reviews.text: This product works nicely, while I was still dating my husband who has a dog, I would bring my kids over and my youngest who has severe allergies and asthma would require breathing treatments. We bought this along with the ADS and ADMS anti allergen sprays a whole house cleaning. Since starting to use these products he hasn't had to have any breathing treatments.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Anti Allergen Carpet Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great product and would have received five stars except the product does seem exceptionally soapy. Will purchase again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy.
customer_reviews.text: We rented a house for 6 weeks that had 3 cats. My husband walked in and within 3 minutes he was sneezing, coughing, rubbing his eyes, nose running. He was miserable. I research how to get rid of the dander and all reports said you have to replace the carpets. Well, it wasn't our house. So I read the reviews on this carpet shampoo and the allergy mist. I shampooed every carpet in the house and sprayed the mist on every wall, baseboard, and furniture. AND I got rid of it all. NO MORE ALLERGY!!!! Unbelievable. I am so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: This keeps my rugs clean and allergen/dust mite free
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use in my rug shampoo machine. It cleans durt and grime and also rids the rugs of all the dust mites and allergens that accumulate. I am a repeat buyer and need this product to keep my place clean and the air fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This the best carpet shampoo every made...and I have tried them all. I have never found any other brand that would get pet dander out. I have severe allergens and asthma to pet dander, pollen and dust. I'm not to sure about cat dander but it helps so much. It smells fresh without any of those horrible scents they add to most carpet cleaners. I takes very little to do a great job and gets it done. I even put a little in my mop water to do the tile and vinyl floors, and a little in my dog blanket load to wash. These products are the best. Can't say enough.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZING PRODUCT FOR BLOOD PRESSURE

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: It pulled alot of dust aND grime from my carpeting and relieved our itchy dry skin pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Retro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning ability works well and the smell is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce McElmurray

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about this shampoo, because I have been disappointed with some others, but I was pleasantly surprised at how good it cleaned my carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Renstrom

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Our hunting camp is prone to mildew, being closed up for 6 months of the year. This product did a fantastic job of cleaning the moldy spots from the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

product_meta.title: All Rug Anti Allergen Carpet Shampoo 128 oz.
product_meta.description: A concentrated, low foaming shampoo for carpets, rugs and upholstery. For use with cold or hot water extraction machines or steam cleaning units. Cleans water-soluble soils and oil-based matter such as grease, oils, etc. while removing allergens from carpets. For warm water extraction or machine cleaning. Thoroughly vacuum carpet/upholstery before using. Follow equipment manufacturer's dilution instructions (typically 1 oz. per gallon of very warm water). Allow surface to dry thoroughly.
feature_bullets: Typical usage is 1 oz. per gallon of warm water
Contains ACARIL, a proprietary Anti-Allergen Ingredient
Cleans water-soluble soils and oil-based matter such as grease, oils, etc. while removing allergens from carpets
Use AllersearchAll Rug throughout your home on carpet, area rugs and soft furnishings
All Allersearch products are safe for people, pets and the environment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
